defined_args.name: csvfilepath
defined_args.notes: only required arg, name of file to fill dataframe/chart

defined_args.name: pngfilepath
defined_args.notes: if not supplied, will use csv filename as .png

defined_args.name: xlabelflex
defined_args.notes: remove some x labels to prevent over-crowding. 1=best guess, lower=fewer labels, 0 disables.

defined_args.name: xlabelslicer
defined_args.notes: list of slicer positions [first,second] for xlabel, where 0 == empty (aka [0,0] == [:]

defined_args.name: ymin
defined_args.notes: y intercept of x.  If none, allow charting to make best guess.

defined_args.name: ynumberformat
defined_args.notes: yaxis label format, can be byte or number or none

defined_args.name: legendxy
defined_args.notes: relative position (0-1) of legend box.  0.5, 0.5 would be middle of chart.

defined_args.name: legendcolumns
defined_args.notes: how many horizontal columns in legend box

defined_args.name: colors
defined_args.notes: list of colors to add to the front of color unused list

defined_args.name: sort
defined_args.notes: column index, asc/desc.  skipped if index <0

defined_args.name: dfpivot
defined_args.notes: perform pivot operation. xcolumn must have exactly 1 entry (unique row), ycolumn exactly 2 (column to pivot to new columns, data).

defined_args.name: annotate
defined_args.notes: indicates whether to annotate charts where that is applicable, like heatmaps.

defined_args.name: heatmapcolorcount
defined_args.notes: number of colors (from colors) to pull into heatmaps.

defined_args.name: heatmapmin
defined_args.notes: lower bound for color in heatmaps.

defined_args.name: heatmapmax
defined_args.notes: upper bound for color in heatmaps.
